name: Byron Anderson
bio: Elixir is the language that I want to be using.  Pattern matching + `with` + processes, oh my!  It makes me excited to program again!

name: Alexis Brodeur
bio: I've been an avid Elixir user for over 2 years.  It is the language I want to be using professionally.  Everyone I know knows about my passion for Elixir, which is why they call me Alexir
